text: Fernando de la Rúa (15 September 1937 - 9 July 2019) was an Argentine politician. He was president of the country from December 10, 1999 to December 21, 2001.New York Times (September 26, 1999) He resigned during the December 2001 riots. World Briefing | Americas: Argentina: Human Rights Extraditions The New York Times, December 25, 2001 He died of heart and kidney failure in Belén de Escobar, Argentina on 9 July 2019 at the age of 81.Murió Fernando de la Rúa: de la militancia al poder, con una breve y conflictiva gestión ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography and tenure by CIDOB (in Spanish) Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Presidents of Argentina Category:Mayors of Buenos Aires Category:Argentine lawyers
title: Fernando de la Rúa
